input:
- Project: University voting system
- Feature: Signup + email verification
- DB: SQLite
- Deadline: 2025-12-05

output.title: Project: University voting system
output.summary: This project is a university voting system with a signup and email verification feature. It uses SQLite as the database and targets a deadline of 2025-12-05. The focus is on secure registration and reliable vote storage.

input:
Notes:
• Keep login page minimal
• Forgot password via email
• Passwords hashed
• Add admin panel for results

output.title: Keep login page minimal
output.summary: Design a minimal login page that supports email-based password reset. Ensure passwords are stored hashed for security. Provide an admin panel to view and manage results.

input: Paragraph: The team needs to automate summarizing meeting notes and converting bullet lists into JSON for analytics. It should handle multiple small inputs and produce consistent JSON outputs. Output must include a short summary and key-value extraction.

output.title: The team needs to automate summarizing
bullets: The team needs to automate summarizing meeting notes and converting bullet lists into JSON for analytics.
It should handle multiple small inputs and produce consistent JSON outputs.
Output must include a short summary and key-value extraction.
output.summary: The goal is to automate summarization of meeting notes and convert bullet lists into JSON for analytics. The system must handle multiple small inputs and produce consistent JSON structures including a brief summary and extracted key-value pairs.

structured.point_1: The team needs to automate summarizing meeting notes and converting bullet lists into JSON for analytics.
structured.point_2: It should handle multiple small inputs and produce consistent JSON outputs.
structured.point_3: Output must include a short summary and key-value extraction.
